name: JoinThePollution
description: The scenery…a desert-like salt lake area next to the beach and the English airport and satellite antennas bases in Limassol, Cyprus. This magic scenery which is also a wildlife habitat for rare birds, flamingos and other of nature's creatures was used by many to dump their old appliances and home furnishings. This series was created as a commentary of polluting the area in 2006 and was at the time printed in life-size murals placed as photographic installations around the city of Limassol.
